attributes.action:
Deescalate war in Ukraine /commit to peaceful resolution.
Solutions & sanctions
attributes.background: Find a way that allows Putin to withdraw without losing face & for the people of Ukraine to return safely. All efforts to finding a peaceful solution not just sanctions. Deescalate & help Ukraine and Russia to find a way out - be the purveyor of peace before cornered egos make the unthinkable happen

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see the situation in Ukraine deescalate, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to achieve this.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Do not send any UK military to Ukraine, and send aid only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609596
